input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Example:BMC_AR_System

output.description: String Value - The name of the adapter to be used by this process
String Value - The name of the schema with which to interact
String Value - The type of system defined within the module configuration
XML document used to format an adapter response that has been mapped from the application field name(s) to the Concept elements
String Value - The version of the adapter in use
An XML document that contains collection data
XML document that maps the normalized concept value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized concept value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
String Value - default work order type Example: General
String Value - default authentication schema Example: CTM:People
String Value - default authentication user name Example: orchestrationuser

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: success, failure

String Value â€“ A verbose message indicating the success or failure of the process
Example: Data found for configuration name BMC_AR_System

input.value: **** Show contents of version after extraction from Global ******

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="UTF-8" /> <xsl:template match="/mappings"> <mappings> <xsl:for-each select="//node()[@version="default" or @version="${version}"]"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:for-each> </mappings> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="UTF-8" /> <xsl:template match="/mappings"> <mappings> <xsl:for-each select="//node()[@version="default" or @version="${version}"]"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:for-each> </mappings> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow will extract all configuration data for this module.
